desc: A structure defining when the graph triggers onProgress events to track and/or debug its execution

definition.label: flowIn
definition.desc: When a Block has been called

definition.label: flowOut
definition.desc: When a Block has terminated (Success or Error)

definition.label: notPluggedProgress
definition.desc: When a Block has returned an unplugged Progress

definition.label: select
definition.desc: When a Select is done (pending), succeeds (connected) or failed (disconnected)
